summary: This document outlines the revocation and termination of The Jeffrey E. Epstein 2001 Trust Two by Jeffrey E. Epstein. It details the roles of the trustees and the legal authority under which Epstein is revoking the trust, indicating that all assets are to be returned to him.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the Grantor who initiated the revocation and termination of the trust.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is one of the current trustees of the trust and is mentioned in the context of receiving the revocation notice.

persons.name: Andrew Farkas
persons.context: Andrew Farkas is another trustee of the trust who is mentioned as receiving the revocation notice.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is mentioned as a trustee who did not execute the Amended and Restated Trust Agreement.

connections.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the Grantor of the trust, while Darren K. Indyke serves as one of the trustees.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is the Grantor of the trust, while Andrew Farkas serves as one of the trustees.
Darren K. Indyke and Andrew Farkas are both trustees of The Jeffrey E. Epstein 2001 Trust Two.
Darren K. Indyke is a trustee while Jes Staley is mentioned as a trustee who did not execute the trust agreement.
Andrew Farkas is a trustee while Jes Staley is mentioned as a trustee who did not execute the trust agreement.

events.title: Revocation of The Jeffrey E. Epstein 2001 Trust Two
events.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein formally revoked and terminated The Jeffrey E. Epstein 2001 Trust Two, directing that all assets be returned to him.

events.title: Amendment of Trust Agreement
events.description: The Original Trust Agreement was amended and restated, naming Darren K. Indyke, Jes Staley, and Andrew Farkas as trustees.

keyFacts: The document is a formal revocation and termination of The Jeffrey E. Epstein 2001 Trust Two.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is the Grantor who executed the revocation.
Darren K. Indyke and Andrew Farkas are the current trustees of the trust.
Jes Staley is mentioned as a trustee who did not execute the Amended and Restated Trust Agreement.
The revocation was executed on October 4, 2012.
